title: Paypal Payment Help
body:
I am unable to log into paypal to pay. How do I log into paypal?
Edit : This is what shows up when I select the amount i wish to purchase, there is no log in screen or anything. Just the "Pay Now" button, clicking it brings up a generic error.

replies.body: I am dumb. I figured it out. Cancelled Billing Agreement and it took me to the login.

No worries ^_^! Glad you were able to get that figured out before I got to your post though.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
